question: Which E-commerce giant has recently acquired mobile gaming start-up Mech Mocha?
explanation:
E-commerce giant Flipkart has recently acquired mobile gaming start-up Mech Mocha, which runs the first live-social gaming platform, 'Hello Play'.
After the acquisition, the intellectual property from the start-up and the skilled gaming team will also join Flipkart. This is a part of the Walmart-owned companyâ€™s initiatives to engage with users on its platform.
